original: @70b // aom t'a re tutt'a re tsa la pra tsa la sh'i ghram g'a mi ni de ba tatta autstsha tra ya h'um /
analyzed: @70b // aom t'a re tutt'a re tsa la pra tsa la sh'i ghram g'a mi ni de ba tatta autstsha tra ya h'um /
translated: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture svāhā

original: 'di bya rog gi sgros lan sum cu rtsa gcig bzlas nas bsgrub bya'i sgo la sbas pas zhag bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di bya rog gi sgros lan sum cu rtsa gcig bzlas nas bsgrub bya'i sgo la sbas pas zhag bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites this mantra of the crow's voice thirty-one times and hides it at the door of the one to be subdued, in seven days they will be expelled.

original: sgrol ma'i gzungs kyis sri na lag la lan bdun bzlas la /
analyzed: sgrol ma'i gzungs kyis sri na lag la lan bdun bzlas la /
translated: If one recites the Tārā mantra seven times over a snake's head,

original: bdag gi mig gnyis phyis te /
analyzed: bdag gi mig gnyis phyis te /
translated: wipe one's own two eyes,

original: de nas rgyal po'i drung du phyin na rgyal po de slob ma lta bur 'gyur bas dad pa byed pa dang / ngag tu mi smra /
analyzed: de nas rgyal po'i drung du phyin na rgyal po de slob ma lta bur 'gyur bas dad pa byed pa dang / ngag tu mi smra /
translated: and then go into the presence of a king, that king will become like a disciple, and will have faith, not speak,

original: sbyin pa ster /
analyzed: sbyin pa ster /
translated: give gifts,

original: khol ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khol ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: and become like a servant.

original: khros kyang dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khros kyang dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if angry, he will come under one's control.

original: 'di ni yid ches pas ngo mtshar ro //
analyzed: 'di ni yid ches pas ngo mtshar ro //
translated: This is amazing because it is trustworthy.

original: bdag nyid sgrol mar bsgoms te /
analyzed: bdag nyid sgrol mar bsgoms te /
translated: Visualize oneself as Tārā.

original: tsha ba'i mar khus lus byug pa bya /
analyzed: tsha ba'i mar khus lus byug pa bya /
translated: Anoint one's body with hot ghee.

original: sngags khri bzlas /
analyzed: sngags khri bzlas /
translated: Recite the mantra ten thousand times.

original: bzlas pa'i rjes su 'bras mkhar ma can gyi ma dag pa dri ma bton /
analyzed: bzlas pa'i rjes su 'bras mkhar ma can gyi ma dag pa dri ma bton /
translated: After the recitation, remove impurities with unhusked rice.

original: de la snum khur byas la bsgrub bya la byin na nges par the tshom med pa'o //
analyzed: de la snum khur byas la bsgrub bya la byin na nges par the tshom med pa'o //
translated: If one anoints the head with this and gives it to the victim, [the victim] will certainly be brought under one's power, without a doubt.

original: gos kyi thu ba nas bzung ste gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs kyi gnod byed bkug la thu bar gtums te mdud pa byas la sngags 'di lan bdun bsngags la /
analyzed: gos kyi thu ba nas bzung ste gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs kyi gnod byed bkug la thu bar gtums te mdud pa byas la sngags 'di lan bdun bsngags la /
translated: If one seizes the hem of one's garment, summons the harm-doers of the direction to which one is going, wraps [them] in the hem, ties [it], and incants this mantra seven times,

original: 'jigs pa'i sa gang du 'gro yang 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i sa gang du 'gro yang 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
translated: one will not encounter any danger wherever one goes.

original: stag dang / chom rkun dang / sprul dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / dred la sogs pas kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stag dang / chom rkun dang / sprul dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / dred la sogs pas kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will not be harmed by tigers, thieves, snakes, elephants, buffaloes, bears, and so forth.

original: dbang gi thab tu autpala dmar po'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang gi thab tu autpala dmar po'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: If one offers into the fire of the power hearth one hundred and eight red lotuses, whomever one desires will be brought under one's power.

original: spra tshil dang ske tshe'i 'bras bu dang / po so cha dang / aa sho ka'i lo ma rnams mar dang sbrang rtsi'i ldi gu dang bcas pas stong phrag lnga'i sbyin sreg gis nyi ma bdun gyis rang 'dod pa'i bu mo thob bo //
analyzed: spra tshil dang ske tshe'i 'bras bu dang / po so cha dang / aa sho ka'i lo ma rnams mar dang sbrang rtsi'i ldi gu dang bcas pas stong phrag lnga'i sbyin sreg gis nyi ma bdun gyis rang 'dod pa'i bu mo thob bo //
translated: With five thousand oblations of beeswax, mustard seed, and pomegranate flowers, together with a paste of ghee and honey, in seven days one will obtain a girl of one's choice.

original: aom t'a re tut'a re tu re aa mu ka bhidha na ku m'a ri ma h'a murbha he na ta pya pi t'a pra yatstsha du me sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom t'a re tut'a re tu re aa mu ka bhidha na ku m'a ri ma h'a murbha he na ta pya pi t'a pra yatstsha du me sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ tāre ture ture amuka bhidana kumārī mahāmurha he na tapya tapya prayaccha dūme svāhā.

original: rgya shug gi tsher ma stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog dang bcas pas sreg blugs byas na /
analyzed: rgya shug gi tsher ma stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog dang bcas pas sreg blugs byas na /
translated: If one offers five thousand oblations of jujube thorns together with natural flowers,

original: skyes pas sbyong ba'i bu mo yang 'gugs so //
analyzed: skyes pas sbyong ba'i bu mo yang 'gugs so //
translated: one will summon even a girl who is being courted by another.

original: sngags ni / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ka bhatt'a nam sv'a tha na ta pas ka r'a ya ma ma na ke dza /
analyzed: sngags ni / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ka bhatt'a nam sv'a tha na ta pas ka r'a ya ma ma na ke dza /
translated: The mantra is: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture amuka bhattanam svādhāna tapaskaraṇāya mama nikaṃ ja.

original: zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma phyag gnyis zhal gcig ma lcags kyu dang autpala zhags pa dang bcas pa rnams bri /
analyzed: zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma phyag gnyis zhal gcig ma lcags kyu dang autpala zhags pa dang bcas pa rnams bri /
translated: On a cloth stained with menstrual blood, one should draw the Blessed Lady with two arms and one face, holding an iron hook and an utpala with a noose.

original: de'i mdun @71a * //
analyzed: de'i mdun @71a * //
translated: In front of her

original: du mchod pa byas nas /
analyzed: du mchod pa byas nas /
translated: one should make offerings.

original: phyi nas bsgoms ldan sngags bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nas bsgoms ldan sngags bzla bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one who is endowed with meditation should recite the mantra.

original: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ki ma ma ai pis tam sv'a bnam ka th'a ya h'um phat /
analyzed: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ki ma ma ai pis tam sv'a bnam ka th'a ya h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture amuki mama īpsitaṃ sādhaya hūṃ phaṭ.

original: stong phrag ldas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong phrag ldas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting it a thousand times, she will come.

original: zhags pas aa mu ka'i mgrin pa bcings /
analyzed: zhags pas aa mu ka'i mgrin pa bcings /
translated: With the noose, one should bind the throat of the amuka,

original: lcags kyus drangs nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i 'og tu bsams te /
analyzed: lcags kyus drangs nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i 'og tu bsams te /
translated: and with the iron hook, one should draw her and imagine the victim under one's feet.

original: khol mo'i tshul gyis bza' bar bya'o //🔽na mo gu ru bhya:me sbar bsangs nas thab bskyed /
analyzed: khol mo'i tshul gyis bza' bar bya'o // na mo gu ru bhya:me sbar bsangs nas thab bskyed /
translated: One should eat her in the manner of a slave.🔽Homage to the Guru.🔽Having ignited the fire and made the oblation, one should generate the hearth.

original: byin brlabs spyan drangs pad gdan dbul //
analyzed: byin brlabs spyan drangs pad gdan dbul //
translated: Bless, invite, and offer a lotus seat.

original: chu bzhi phul la phyag rgya bstan //
analyzed: chu bzhi phul la phyag rgya bstan //
translated: Offer the four water offerings and display the mudrā.

original: dgug gzhug dbang bskur rgyas gang ba bya //
analyzed: dgug gzhug dbang bskur rgyas gang ba bya //
translated: Summon, usher in, confer empowerment, and fill with fragrance.

original: ku sha byon zan me ltas brtag / sreg rdzas phul nas mchod bstod bya //
analyzed: ku sha byon zan me ltas brtag / sreg rdzas phul nas mchod bstod bya //
translated: The offering and praise after presenting the burnt offerings.

original: nang mchod h'um tra dzva yis bsang //
analyzed: nang mchod h'um tra dzva yis bsang //
translated: The inner offering is purified with hūṃ traṃ jaḥ.🔽The pledge beings are generated and invoked,

original: 'das pa'i dam tshig bskyed cing gzhug / dbang bskur mchod bstod byon zan dbul //
analyzed: 'das pa'i dam tshig bskyed cing gzhug / dbang bskur mchod bstod byon zan dbul //
translated: The empowerment is conferred, and offerings and praise are made. The arrival of the kuśa grass is offered.

original: sreg rdzas mchod bstod gsol ba gdab //
analyzed: sreg rdzas mchod bstod gsol ba gdab //
translated: The burnt offerings are offered, and offerings and praise are made. The supplication is made.

original: bzod gsol gshegs shing dam tshig bsdu //
analyzed: bzod gsol gshegs shing dam tshig bsdu //
translated: The forbearance is requested, and the fire god departs. The pledge beings are gathered.

original: me lha gsol gdab sreg rdzas kyi //
analyzed: me lha gsol gdab sreg rdzas kyi //
translated: The fire god is requested, and the remaining burnt offerings

original: lhag ma phul la dgang blugs gsum //
analyzed: lhag ma phul la dgang blugs gsum //
translated: are offered. The pouring and filling are done three times.

original: yon bdag lag pa nas bzung dbul //
analyzed: yon bdag lag pa nas bzung dbul //
translated: The patron holds the hand and makes the offering.

original: gtor ma mchod pa bstod pa dbul //
analyzed: gtor ma mchod pa bstod pa dbul //
translated: The bali offering, the offering, and the praise are offered.

original: gsol ba gdab cing me lha gshegs //
analyzed: gsol ba gdab cing me lha gshegs //
translated: The supplication is made, and the fire god departs.

original: dam tshig bsdu zhing lhag chad bskang//
analyzed: dam tshig bsdu zhing lhag chad bskang//
translated: The pledge beings are gathered, and the excess and lack are amended.
